author: Xerbutri
description: Werkspoor-bridge at Utrecht across the Amsterdam-Rijnkanaal
realname: Werkspoor-bridge at Utrecht across the Amsterdam-Rijnkanaal
title: Werkspoor-bridge
intro: We visited this bridge in november 2005, just after we visited the DEMKA-bridge lying next to it. The bridge has the longest span of the Netherlands, it spans 237 meters. It's a beautiful new bridge, but already there's a lot of graffiti. The trains aren't moving fast since they have to stop in the station of Utrecht. There are no hiding places on the bridge. Definitely not a place to be.
history: The bridge was build in 2003 next to the DEMKA-spoorbrug. The DEMKA-brug needs a renovation, it's situated in the middle of Utrecht and is noisy. The new Werkspoorbrug is more quiet.
